question: where is south pole located on a map
api_result: The South Pole is located at the southernmost point of the Earth. On a map, it is found at the coordinates 90 degrees south latitude, with no longitude value since all lines of longitude converge at the poles. On a typical world map, which is usually oriented with north at the top, the South Pole would be at the very bottom. On a globe, it is at the opposite end from the North Pole. The South Pole is situated on the continent of Antarctica.
